# Google GenAI SDK (Gemini API)

**Type:** External Knowledge
**Source:** [https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs](https://ai.google.dev/gemini-api/docs)
**Last Indexed:** November 25, 2025

## The Spirit
This is the official documentation for the **Google GenAI SDK**, the engine that powers `theeseeks`. We shadow this documentation to ensure the Advisor knows how to use its own tools effectively.

## The Skeleton (Index)
*   [Quickstart](./quickstart.md) - Basic installation and first request.
*   [Text Generation](./text_generation.md) - Core capability for the Advisor.
